titleStmt.title: The humble petition of some of the inhabitants of the parish of Leonard Shoreditch against Iohn Squire, vicar of the parish aforesaid, together with thirteene articles against the aforesaid Iohn Squire. Also the humble petition of the major, recorder, alderman, common councell men, and inhabitants of the borough of Kings Lyn in the county of Norfolk.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Franke, and are to be sold at his shop next doore to the Kings head in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop next doore to the Kings head in Fleetstreet
